bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition Combined Designation of all diseases associated with shi 屍 , corpse [qi], such as shi zhu 屍注 , corpse [qi] influx, fei shi 飛屍 , flying corpse [qi], dun shi 遁屍 , run-away corpse [qi]. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 23: 以其屍病注易傍人，故為屍注 , “Because the corpse [qi] disease flows into a person nearby it causes a ‘corpse [qi] influx ’”. Under the heading Shi bing zhu hou 屍病諸候 , “All signs of corpse [ qi ] diseases ”, it lists shi zhu 屍注 , corpse [qi] influx, fei shi 飛屍 , flying corpse [qi], dun shi 遁屍 , run-away corpse [qi], and states that all these diseases 變狀多端，其病大體略 同，而有小異，但以一方治之 , “May assume many forms. Basically they are identical, but in the details of their appearance they may differ. Still, they can be cured with one and the same recipe”.
